precontractDisagree.title: We need your agreement
precontractDisagree.detail: You are just a step away from receiving overdraft. To continue, we need your agreement to pre-contractual information and a contract signature. Do you have any questions? Let's talk about it.
precontractDisagree.branch: Visit  a branch/find the closest branch

contractDisagree.title: We need your agreement
contractDisagree.detail: You are just a step away from receiving overdraft. To continue, we need your agreement to pre-contractual information and a contract signature. Do you have any questions? Let's talk about it.
contractDisagree.branch: Visit  a branch/find the closest branch

scoringLessDisagree.title: That is the best we can offer you at this moment
scoringLessDisagree.detail: This is the amount of overdraft you could receive, should you reconsider and accept our offer.

api.title: We are sorry, something went wrong

moreMoney.title: Need a higher Overdraft?
moreMoney.detail: That should not be a problem. We can set it to up to 100,000 CZK in Internet Banka or in our branch. You can do it yourself in Online Banking or visit one of out branches and we will be happy to assist you.

branch.title: We can't do that within the app just yet
branch.detail:
We are sorry, we aren't able to calculate your Overdraft in Smart Banka.

You can apply for Overdraft in Internet Banka, at our branch or call us for more information.

weCallYou.title: We will call you
weCallYou.detail: One of out phone operators will try to reach you by the end of the following business day. If he is not able to reach you he will try later.

uncommittedChanges.title: We will not save the changes made in this form if you leave this page. Is that ok?

criteriaFailed.title: Unfortunately, we are unable to offer you Overdraft at this time.
criteriaFailed.detail: This is all we can help you with in the app, thank you for understanding.

scoring.title: We are sorry, something went wrong
scoring.detail: An unexpected error has occurred while processing your request. Please, try again later - we recommend cancelling the application and filling it out again.

noticePeriod.title: Unfortunately, we have some bad news :(
noticePeriod.detail: We cannot offer you Overdraft during the trial or notice period. If you are currently within the trial period stop by one of our branches, we will try to work something out.

SCORING_UNAVAILABLE.title: ZZZzzzz….
SCORING_UNAVAILABLE.detail:
At night, we update some of our systems; therefore some systems might be unavailable.

Please come back in a couple of hours when we are up.

PRECONTRACT_WAITING_FOR_OPEN_HOURS.title: This will take all night…
PRECONTRACT_WAITING_FOR_OPEN_HOURS.detail: Every night we update our systems; therefore some systems might be unavailable. Unfortunately, we are currently unable to prepare your documents - we will have them ready for you by the morning at about 8 am. Thank you for understanding.

CONTRACT_WAITING_FOR_OPEN_HOURS.title: Every night we update our systems; therefore some systems might be unavailable. Unfortunately, we are currently unable to prepare your documents - we will have them ready for you by the morning at about 8 am. Thank you for understanding.

general.supportChat: Loan process just like in our branch - click here and our banker will be happy to assist you with the application via online chat.

flexikreditHelp.title: Do you need assistance or wish to save the application for later??
bullets: Fully online - and active moments after arranging immediately during business hours ; you will only have to visit us if it is absolutely necessary.
Automatic repayment with incoming payments - and if you need it you can use it again right away.
You pay interest only for the days you use Overdraft.

Incoming transactions need to reach at least {{minCreditMonthlyAmount}} CZK a month - this amount does not include amounts transferred from your other Moneta accounts, including Savings and Business accounts, and income from credit interest of these accounts.
Opening, managing, and cancelling is free - you can decide when to stop using Overdraft or completely cancel it.
To protect you from unauthorized Overdraft we will block the last 500 CZK of your Overdraft as a reserve.
flexikreditHelp.detail: All information on Flexikredit Overdraft can be found on our website.
flexikreditHelp.underlineInfo: Overdraft without drawdown fees can be arranged only in Smart Banka or Internet Banka.
flexikreditHelp.example: How much will you pay while using Overdraft? For example: drawing a line of credit of {{loanAmount}} CZK in full for {{totalDueMonths}} months, the annual interest rate will be {{interestRate}} %, drawdown fee {{drawdownFee}} CZK, APR {{rpsn}} % and the total due amount {{totalDueAmount}} CZK.
flexikreditHelp.needOtherTimeTitle: Do you need to finish the application later?

flexikreditSetup.title: The Flexikredit Overdraft for the account:
flexikreditSetup.subtitle: Don't worry that you won't run out of standing orders before you are paid. The Flexikredit reserve, available at any time, will be your security.
flexikreditSetup.accountTitle: Account to which we will set the overdraft
flexikreditSetup.underlineInfo: Overdraft without drawdown fees can be arranged only in Smart Banka or Internet Banka.
flexikreditSetup.example: How much will you pay while using Overdraft? For example: drawing a line of credit of {{loanAmount}} CZK in full for {{totalDueMonths}} months, the annual interest rate will be {{interestRate}} %, drawdown fee {{drawdownFee}} CZK, APR {{rpsn}} % and the total due amount {{totalDueAmount}} CZK.
flexikreditSetup.tip: Tip: Unsure of the Overdraft amount to choose? Our clients choose on average 15 000 CZK.
bullets: Fully online - and active moments after arranging immediately during business hours ; you will only have to visit us if it is absolutely necessary.
Automatic repayment with incoming payments - and if you need it you can use it again right away.
You pay interest only for the days you use Overdraft.

Incoming transactions need to reach at least {{minCreditMonthlyAmount}} CZK a month - this amount does not include amounts transferred from your other Moneta accounts, including Savings and Business accounts, and income from credit interest of these accounts.
Opening, managing, and cancelling is free - you can decide when to stop using Overdraft or completely cancel it..
To protect you from unauthorized Overdraft we will block the last 500 CZK of your Overdraft as a reserve.
flexikreditSetup.detail: All information on Flexikredit Overdraft can be found on our website.

clipFlexikreditSetup.title: Increase your overdraft for {{0}}
clipFlexikreditSetup.underlineInfo-missing: You can arrange an overdraft without a drawdown fee only in Smart Banka or Internet Banka
clipFlexikreditSetup.example: How much do you pay for drawing an overdraft?For example, if you run out of credit {{loanAmount}} CZK in fukll for {{totalDueMonths}} months, the annual interest rate will be {{interestRate}} %, the drawdown fee {{drawdownFee}} CZK, RPSN {{rpsn}} % and the total amount due {{totalDueAmount}} CZK.
clipFlexikreditSetup.tip-missing: Tip: Don't know what amount of overdraft to choose? Our clients choose on average 15 000 CZK.
bullets: You will increase the overdraft online and after the agreement it will be active shortly – you will visit us, only when necessary.

You will repay as usual – automatically by incoming payments. It will suffice if {{minCreditMonthlyAmount}} CZK arrives at your account monthly, this amount does not include transfers from any of your accounts with us, including savings and business, transfers from internal accounts and interest income from funds in your accounts.
To help protect you from unauthorized overdrafts, we will keep the last 500 CZK as a reserve.
clipFlexikreditSetup.detail: You can also find information on the web.

permanentAddress.title: Is this your resident address?
permanentAddress.detail: You will enter your contact address in the next step

identification.title: Is this your name and surname?
identification.taxResidenceInfoBody: We request information from you in order to fulfill the Common Standard for due diligence in the area of ​​information on financial accounts for the purpose of exchanging information provided by financial institutions to tax administrations on the basis of the Multilateral Agreement of Competent Authorities on the Automatic Exchange of Information on Financial Accounts (in case banks, these are current, savings accounts and time deposits).

entrepreneur.taxBaseInfoMessage: Zadejte základ daně z minulého roku. Najdete ho v daňovém přiznání. V případě, že uplatňujete paušální daň, zastavte se za námi na pobočku kde s Vámi žádost dokončíme.
entrepreneur.line101LastTaxationPeriodIncomeInfoMessa: Zadejte částku z řádku 101 z daňového přiznání z minulého roku. V případě, že uplatňujete paušální daň, zastavte se za námi na pobočku kde s Vámi žádost dokončíme.
entrepreneur.unpaidTaxForLastYearInfoMessage: Zadejte skutečnou daň z příjmu z řádku 91 z daňového přiznání z minulého roku.
entrepreneur.taxInfoMessage: Po uplatnění slevy podle paragrafu 35c zákona ř. 71 - ř. 73

otherSource.title: Visit us at a branch
otherSource.detail: We're sorry, but we can't calculate the loan for you directly in Smart Bank. Please stop by our branch, where we'll sort everything out, or call us for more information.

employerSearch.title: Employer auto-fill
employerSearch.hint: Please enter at least the first 3 letters (with diacritics) of your employer

personalSolvency.title: Is this your net monthly income?
personalSolvency.alternativeTitle: What is your net monthly income?
personalSolvency.detail: If your income varies please enter the average of the last 3 months. Do you need a moment to calculate? Take your time - you can find your saved application in Balance Overview in Smart Banka.

pensionerPersonalSolvency.title: Is this your monthly pension?
pensionerPersonalSolvency.detail: If your pension varies please enter the average of the last 3 months. Do you need a moment to calculate? Take your time - you can find your saved application in Balance Overview in Smart Banka.

dependents.title: How many dependents?
dependents.detail: A dependent is any person who at least partly relies on your income for financial support. How many of those close to you would be affected by a decrease in your income?

pensionerDependents.title: How many dependents?
pensionerDependents.detail: A dependent is any person who at least partly relies on your income for financial support. How many of those close to you would be affected by a decrease in your pension?

householdSolvency.title: What is the net monthly income of your household?
householdSolvency.detail: Enter the net monthly income of your household - if the income varies please enter the average of the last 3 months. Do you need a moment to calculate? Take your time - you can find your saved application in Balance Overview in Smart Banka.

pensionerHouseholdSolvency.title: What is the net monthly income of your household?
pensionerHouseholdSolvency.detail: Enter the net monthly income of your household - if the income varies please enter the average of the last 3 months. Do you need a moment to calculate? Take your time - you can find your saved application in Balance Overview in Smart Banka.

housingExpenses.title: What is your household expenses?
housingExpenses.detail: Please enter all your monthly regular housing expenses. For instance rent, electric bills, water bills or other services. If you're sharing your housing expenses, please enter your share. Do not include mortgage payments, internet bills, food, clothing or household insurance.

householdExpensesNecessary.title: What are the other monthly expenses of your household?
householdExpensesNecessary.installmentsSumSection: Do you pay off the lease or loan elsewhere than at MONETA Money Bank?
householdExpensesNecessary.necessaryExpensesSection: What are the necessary expenses of you and your dependents?
householdExpensesNecessary.necessaryExpensesInfo: These are regular living expenses that you can't live without. If you share them, only include their pro rata.

necessaryExpensesError.title: Your necessary monthly expenses are higher than your income
necessaryExpensesError.detail: You may have included rent or a mortgage payment. We are mainly interested in the necessary monthly expenses

richBullets.title: Food, clothing, internet payments, insurance, housing costs (such as rent, utility bills, water and other services)
Education for children (nurseries, kindergartens, schools, lunches, clubs, groups)
Please do not include loan repayments including mortgages

otherInfo.title: Now the small details:
otherInfo.detail: Please choose a form of ID with which you could present at one of our branches.

scoringAgreement.title: One last step - the agreement
scoringAgreement.detail:
In order to review your application, we need to process your personal data to inquire your solvency, credibility and payment behavior. This process includes verification in the Czech Banking Credit Bureau and the Czech Non-Banking Credit Bureau, and other steps necessary to contract conclusion.

I acknowledge personal data processing of the MONETA Group and I solemnly declare the following:

  • that all personal data provided are true and up-to-date and that I am aware that providing false or misleading information may result in legal action or prosecution;
  • I have not been convicted of crimes related to my business, or of economic crime, or crime against property;
  • I also declare that:
    • I have not been declared bankrupt, and no insolvency or any such legal action has been taken against my person, nor have any steps been taken to initiate them;
    • the petition for bankruptcy of my assets or the insolvency petition for lack of my assets have not been rejected;
    • none of my assets are being liquidated
    • there are no arrears related to my assets in the Tax Register;
    • there has been no disciplinary punishment against my person in the last three years in accordance with the special regulations governing the performance of professional activities;
    • there are no outstanding arrears on insurance premiums and penalties for public health insurance or on insurance premiums and penalties for social security and contributions to the state employment policy.

I give consent to Moneta Money Bank to verify all necessary information and take any further steps which Moneta Money Bank will deem necessary to the approval of my application.

I acknowledge that according to the Consumer Credit Act, the information that I have been provided is considered a recommendation not advice.

You can be updated on the process of reviewing your application by SMS at the entered phone number.
scoringAgreement.checkboxText: I confirm these details are correct.

We can finish the application together and we will send you the money as soon as it is signed. Please bring with you :

uploadCheck.title: We’re going to check legibility and get back to you
uploadCheck.detail: Your documents should be checked within 15 minutes or by the following business day. As soon as we are ready to continue, we will let you know via SMS. The application has been saved and can be found under Balance Overview.

contract.title: Carefully read the dispositions and special provisions.

victory.title: It is done. Your Overdraft is ready. The world is a bit simpler again :)
victory.detail: All of your documents can be found in My Documents section of Internet Banka and Smart Banka.

clipVictory.title: We increase your overdraft. The world is a little easier once again
clipVictory.detail: You can find all the documents in Smart Banka and Internet Banka in the My documents sections

tomorrowVictory.title: Your Overdraft will be ready next business day in the morning.
tomorrowVictory.detail: All of your documents can be found in My Documents section of Internet Banka and Smart Banka.

delayedVictory.title: We are almost done. The signing may take a while.
delayedVictory.detail: We couldn't sign the document automatically and will have to sign it manually. That may take a while - a couple of hours during business days, and on Monday during weekends. We will save the contract in your My Documents section and activate your Overdraft. We apologize for the inconvenience and appreciate your patience.

scoring.title: Just a moment. The cat needs to look it over.

sign.title: Sign the dispositions and special provisions by your PIN:
